block.p: $685,000 14 Horatio Street (West Fourth Street) (Van Gogh) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 600-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; renovated bath; roof deck and laundry in building; maintenance $922, 55% tax deductible; listed at $699,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Weichert Mazzeo Agency)

$607,500 445 West 19th Street (Chatham) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 542-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; south exposure; terrace; roof deck and laundry in building; common charge $436; taxes $4,642; listed at $635,000, 15 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Vertex Real Estate)

$825,000 304 West 89th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; windowed eat-in kitchen, north and east exposures; laundry in building; maintenance $1,082, 47% tax deductible; listed at $795,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$889,000 61 West 62nd Street (Harmony) 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; windowed eat-in kitchen, north and east exposures, partial Central Park view; balcony; maintenance $1,895, 65% tax deductible; listed at $889,000, 29 weeks on market (broker: Citi Habitats New York)

$365,000 100 Overlook Terrace (190th Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 707-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. lobby attendant; renovated eat-in kitchen; laundry in building; maintenance $498, 35% tax deductible; listed at $379,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)

$455,000 750 Kappock Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,140-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; entry foyer, dining area, windowed kitchen, hardwood floors, 2 walk-in closets, south and west exposures; balcony; maintenance $986, includes parking, 50% tax deductible; listed at $479,000, 21 weeks on market (broker: Trebach Realty)

$635,000 135 Clinton Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a brownstone; renovated eat-in kitchen with upgraded appliances, exposed brick walls, hardwood floors, 3 decorative fireplaces, new windows; maintenance $650, 50% tax deductible; listed at $625,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (brokers: Warren Lewis Realty; Eychner Associates)

$1.35 million 122 South First Street 4-family, 4-story prewar wood-frame house; 3 bedrooms in two units; 1 bedroom in others; eat-in kitchen, renovated bath, wide plank floors, original molding and detail in each; full basement, new plumbing and electric systems in building; 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $503; listed at $1.4 million, 10 weeks on market (broker: Kline Realty)

$355,000 67-71 Yellowstone Boulevard (Lincoln) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; part-time doormen; dining area, renovated eat-in kitchen, 5 closets, hardwood floors, south exposures; maintenance $706, 50% tax deductible; listed at $389,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Benjamin Real Estate)

$972,500 180-23 80th Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 61-year-old brick colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, fireplace; 1-car garage; 45-by-123-ft. lot; taxes $4,630; listed at $1.029 million, 11 weeks on market (broker: Julia Shildkret Real Estate Group)

$850,000 17750 SW 80th Court 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 17-year-old 1-story stucco-sided house; dining room, kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances; in-ground pool, 2-car garage; 1/2-acre lot; taxes $9,229; listed at $880,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Florida WCI Realty)

$167,500 8401 SW 107th Street (Kendall Acres West) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 33-year-old 1,067-sq.-ft. town house condo; dining room, eat-in kitchen with upgraded appliances and pantry; common garden, pool and tennis court in complex; common charge $219; taxes $2,263; listed at $171,900, 7 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Florida WCI Realty)

$530,000 5811 SW 34th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 53-year-old 1-story stucco-sided house; kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, home office; covered patio; 1-car garage; 50-by-113-ft. lot; taxes $2,650; listed at $530,000, 1 week on market (broker: Prudential Florida WCI Realty)
